Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class StudentAccessiblePiece

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.StudentAccessiblePiece
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Character, Cloud, Island, SchoolBoard
public abstract class StudentAccessiblePiece extends Object implements Serializable
Abstract class that includes all pieces which can contain students (Islands, Clouds, etc.)
See Also:

    • getStudentNumber

      public Integer[] getStudentNumber()
      Indexes to Color: [0] = yellow [1] = blue [2] = green [3] = red [4] = purple
      Returns:
      an array of Integers with students counted for each color

    • counter

      public int counter(int lowerExtreme, int upperExtreme)
      Helper method for getStudentNumber, does the actual counting
      Parameters:
      lowerExtreme - first ID with a certain color
      upperExtreme - last ID of the same color
      Returns:
      the student count needed
